blogs.title: My new Website
blogs.body: Just launched my new website! It's got a cool homepage, animations, and a blog section. Still working on dark mode!

blogs.title: Welcome Party
blogs.body: We're throwing a welcome party this Saturday! Drinks, games, and mushroom pizza. Everyone's invited!
